name: PowerTripTV
description:
The year is 2065. The world energy crisis has been solved, and there’s a limitless supply. There was a problem that nobody expected.

POWERTRIP TV.

The show you’re about to watch is so vibrant, so powerful, that just by watching it you might have your mind EXPLODED! THIS GAME WILL LITERALLY KILL YOU JUST BY PLAYING!

READY TO PARTICIPATE IN THE ULTIMATE ARCHITECTURAL SIM IN THE WORLD ~ NAY, GOOD SIR, THE UNIVERSE?

GREAT!

Here’s a few rules that may or may not be important.

  1. Spacebar to place buildings.
  2. Blue spaces = building spaces.
  3. IF THE CAPACITOR CAPS, THEN THE WORLD SNAPS!

Team: 

Kins - Programming, Art, Design.

Trikyname - Programming, Art, Design.

Zackman634 - Writing, Design, Art

FabCode - Art
